content: Look just beyond the shrine for a small ditch running under a wooden bridge. Follow the ditch through the opposite path under the bridge, and head right to a tunnel. Inside, apart from a green Wisp you can absorb for some Will and a mushroom to harvest, you can spot a grubby yet friendly canine deity.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xu_Dog_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Xu Dog Questline', specifically from the subsection 'In the Sandgate Village'.
The content is as follows:
Look just beyond the shrine for a small ditch running under a wooden bridge. Follow the ditch through the opposite path under the bridge, and head right to a tunnel. Inside, apart from a green Wisp you can absorb for some Will and a mushroom to harvest, you can spot a grubby yet friendly canine deity.
